resources.string: You are attempting to log in to Box from a location that has not been approved by your admin. Please talk to your admin to resolve this issue.
Contact your administrator to authorize this device.
The redirect url is not valid
There are problems with the security certificate for this site.
This website or application is requesting authentication.
Unable to detect a network connection
Your administrator has changed your TOS. You must login, and accept the TOS to continue.
To log in, connect to a WiFi or mobile data network.
For your security you must disable screen dimmers or brightness correction applications to continue.
The date of the certificate is invalid.
The certificate is not yet valid.
The certificate authority is not trusted.
You should not proceed, especially if you have never seen this warning before for this site.
We were unable to connect to your network.
Check your network connection and try again.
This will add %1$d comics to your reading list. Continue?
Cache more content for improved performance. Turn it off if you experience app crashes.
"Rescanning for Catalog Changes... Auto rescan can be turned off from preferences."
"Click below to build your catalog by scanning your device's storage for comic files. It may take some time to complete depending on the amount of comic files you have."
You can re-sync your catalog anytime from settings screen.
Download all cloud storage comics on your reading list not present on your device.
This will cancel the download and the comic file will be ignored in future syncs, continue?
ComiCat cannot write to the selected location.
"Can't access share. Either the userid/password are incorrect or you don't have the required permissions."
Change download folder and move already downloaded comics to the new location?
Completed ones will be removed automatically.
"1. From your desktop place your comics into any folder in your '%1$s' account. Nested folders and sub-folders are OK."
2. On your device, ensure that you have the desired network connection (wifi or data plan) switched on. It will be used for downloading the files.
"3. Initiate the Sync by tapping on the service or by selecting the 'Sync All' button from the action bar."
4. Syncing will add new found files to the download queue and will download them as per your settings.
5. You can tweak settings to make best use of your network.
Please note: Sync only downloads new comic files, no previously downloaded file is deleted in the process.
Download comics from your cloud storage account.
Sync parameters for queuing and downloading comics from your Cloud Storage services.

"%1$s: %2$s New files added: %3$d Files removed: %4$d Failures: %5$d
"
Clear bookmarks as a comic is marked read
Report bugs, issues, make feature suggestions etc.
Process of thumbnail creation requires data transfer almost equal to the size of comics stored on cloud storage, continue?
Create thumbnails for comics on SMB shares
Turn off to speed up SMB share scan.
Auto crop white borders for more reading space
Deleting will cancel all the pending downloads for the account. Please note, this will not delete any downloaded comics from your device, continue?
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s from your %2$s?

"This will delete %1$d comics from your %2$s freeing %3$s of storage space.
Files once deleted can't be recovered, continue?"

"Deleting \"%1$s\" will delete %2$d comics from your \"%3$s\".
Files once deleted can't be recovered, continue?"

"\"%1$s\" contains %2$d subfolders and %3$d comics. You can either choose to delete the entire folder tree or just the comics in the folder from your \"%4$s\".
Files once deleted can't be recovered, continue?"
Select and delete multiple comics in one go.
Delete all comics marked as read from your device.
Avoid page turns while panning zoomed page images
Avoid downloading data on roaming networks.
What to do when the comic contains double page spreads
"Comic download location has been changed to '%1$s'."
%1$d download[s] in queue with total size %2$s.
"1. From your desktop place your comics into 'Apps/ComiCat' folder in your Dropbox account. Nested folders and sub-folders are OK."
New comic downloads will be added to the queue in paused mode.
Error saving page image to gallery.
Error deleting folder, there may be some files still remaining in the folder.
Unable to display comic page. It is either corrupt or requires more memory than available. Please retry after restarting the app.
Error opening comic, it may be deleted or unavailable at this time.
Error renaming comic, please retry maybe with a different name.
Error renaming folder, please retry maybe with a different name.
Excluding \"%1$s\" will remove %2$d comic from your catalog, continue?
Manage files and folders excluded from catalog.
Search for duplicate copies of same comics on your device

"Would you like to select Comic Folders before syncing?
Press 'Continue Scanning' to continue with scan of the entire device."
In landscape orientation use Fit Width view mode.
Wrong file extensions cause delay in loading the comic
Identify comic files that can be deleted to free disk space.
General preferences like Starting View, password protection etc.
Show loose comic issues or group them by folders
A concise guide to common and not so common app settings.
Settings guide, troubleshooting and other useful info.
Hide private folders automatically every time the app is re-launched.
Keep comic title hidden by default
Techniques to make your comic reading more enjoyable
Great for scans. Auto adjust contrast, brightness, saturation of comics pages.
File is not in a valid or supported comic format.
"New Comics Found: %1$d Imported: %2$d Failed: %3$d Removed From Catalog: %4$d"
Include Zip, RAR, PDF format files
"You just finished reading the comic. What's next?"
"ComiCat will look for a folder with the provided name on the root of your Cloud storage services. ComiCat will scan and add comics only from this folder. Not applicable for Dropbox and SMB shares."
If selected ComiCat will only scan Comic Folder for comics.
Files once downloaded will not be re-downloaded when deleted from device.
Setup options for manga comic reading
Mark multiple comics from your catalog as read or unread.
Max memory size of image to load. Bigger images will be scaled down. Lower the value if you are having random crashes while reading.
Your device storage is not ready, possible reason \"%1$s\", continue with sync?

"Cloud Shelf Support for OneDrive Support for SMB shares Alternate Comic Covers Ability to select one or more comic folders Ability to select download folder for cloud storage Limit cloud sync to a particular folder Performance Improvements Bug fixes"
"You haven't activated any cloud storage service."
"You don't have any downloaded copies of remote comics."
"Please use the 'Add' button to add Comic Folders. If you don't select comic folders ComiCat will scan the entire device storage for comics."
No data connection found. Please connect to internet and retry.
There are no downloads in queue.
"You don't have any Read comics in your catalog."
All files in your reading list are either local or already downloaded.
Please tap on \"Add Account\" to add a new account.
There is not enough space to move already downloaded comics to the new location. Please choose another location.
Open next comic from reading list:
Animation that is shown when you move from one page to other
Protect your comic collection from unwanted access
Attention: Passwords cannot be recovered, if you forget your password you would need to reinstall ComiCat.
Settings to optimize performance on your device.
You assume all responsibility for posting images to Facebook. This includes Facebook content guidelines and content copyrights. Continue?
Post small thumbnails along with the messages.
Post Update when I finish a Comic
Post Update when I start a Comic
Add To Download Queue as Paused
Include only if inside comic folder
Double tap to toggle view mode
Longpress at bottom for fast seek
Hide folders meant only for private viewing.

"Ratings are like pat on the back, they encourage us to keep enhancing ComiCat so that it keeps up with your needs and expectations.
Would you like to rate ComiCat now?"
Recreate comic and folder covers, it will retain custom covers.
Remove downloaded copies of your cloud storage comics
Remove local copies when deleted from service
Rescan for catalog changes on app start
This helps when you have multiple removable SD cards. When you re-insert a card a very quick scan will bring back the comics with all information.
For double page cover scans use right side page image as cover
Change navigation direction to Right to Left.
Comics in private folders will not display unless you unhide/show them.
"Share doesn't exist or is not online."
"I've been using ComiCat for reading and managing my comic collection. It has been fun so far, check it out:"
Displays your recently read and recently completed comics in the catalog side bar
Select which special folders should be displayed on your shelf.
Show transition animation on page change (requires more memory). Turn off if you are having crashes in viewer.
SMB operation failed, please check connection and permissions.
"Comics in Catalog: %1$d Total Size: %2$s Total Pages: %3$,d Read Comics: %4$d Read Pages: %5$d"
This will %1$s the download, you will lose any data downloaded so far, continue?
Would you like to sync and add comics from this service?
Page starts from top right corner
Commonly asked questions and their solutions
Unlimited supply of classic American comics.
Attention: There is no way to recover the code, if you forget your code you would need to reinstall ComiCat.
"It seems that the database failed to upgrade properly. Please un-install and re-install the app to fix the issue. We sincerely apologize for your inconvenience."
Disable this if you see black & white image for double page spreads.
Downloads will only make use of Wifi network.

"Changes in Box API require you to re-authorize your Box accounts. Press '%1$s' to remove existing Box accounts from %2$s. Please note, this will not delete any downloaded comics from your device, continue? We sincerely apologize for your inconvenience."
When reading comics directly from server
ComiCat needs your authorization to post updates to your Facebook feeds. Authorization would also allow you to post comments while reading your comics.
Attempt to write external storage failed.

"On the last run ComiCat had done something terribly wrong. Would you like to send an error report to help us improve the app?
*We have 100% no spam policy."
Email created log file to meanlabs support
Tap and Hold: Menu for page options.
Backup file is invalid or corrupted.
Loading catalog from backup will overwrite current catalog, reading progress, app settings, cloud services etc. Continue?
